title: conferred on me by section 16(2) of the Consumer Credit (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Credit (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Credit (Amendment) Act 

2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited consumer credit (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: conferred on me by section 16(2) of the Consumer Credit (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The 14th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Consumer Credit (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 13 of 2022) comes into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 November, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [575] 3
